Request an Appointment

DWI Services – Request An Appointment

Confidential/Privacy Policy:Information obtained through the internet is kept strictly confidential. We make it our priority to protect your privacy and confidentiality.

Call Now Request an Appointment

Confidential care. No referral required.


     

    Confidential/Privacy Policy:
    Information obtained through the internet is kept strictly confidential. We make it our priority to protect your privacy and confidentiality.

    We offer FREE TRANSPORTATION to and from your assessment and treatments with us. 

    Visit us at www.YESFixMyDWI.com or

    Call us today at (855) YES FIX MY DWI that’s (855) 937-3496


    What happens when you call

    1. We listen and answer immediate questions.
    2. We explain your options and next steps.
    3. If you choose, we schedule an appointment.

    No referral required.

    Ready to take the next step?

    Call today or request an appointment. We’ll listen, answer your questions, and help you move forward.

    Call Now Request an Appointment

    Confidential care. No referral required.

    If this is an emergency, call 911 or go to your nearest emergency room.
